Module sabi

Package sabi

package sabi
This package contains modules of Sabi framework.
Sabi is a small framework to separate logics and data accesses for Java applications.
Version:
0.1
  • Class
    Description
    Dax
    Dax is an interface for a set of data accesses, and requires a method: Dax.getDaxConn(java.lang.String) which gets a connection to an external data access.
    DaxBase
    DaxBase manages multiple DaxSrc and those DaxConn, and also works as an implementation of 'Dax' interface.
    DaxBase.CommitExceptionOccurs
    An error reason which indicates that a DaxConn of the specified name caused an exception.
    DaxBase.DaxSrcIsNotFound
    An error reason which indicates that a specified DaxSrc instance is not found.
    DaxBase.FailToCommitDaxConn
    An error reason which indicates that some connections failed to commit.
    DaxBase.FailToCreateDaxConn
    An error reason which indicates that it failed to create a new connection to a data source.
    DaxConn
    DaxConn is an interface which represents a connection to a data source.
    DaxSrc
    DaxSrc is an interface which represents a data source like database, etc., and creates a DaxConn to the data source.
    Err
    Err is an exception class with a reason.
    ErrHandler
    This class is a handler of an Err object creation.
    Logic<D>
    Logic is a functional interface which executes a logical process.
    Proc<D>
    Proc is a class which represents a procedure.
    Proc.DaxDoesNotInheritDaxBase
    A error reason which indicates a specified dax does not inherit DaxBase class.
    Runner
    Runner is an interface which has Runner.run() method and is runned by #runSeq or #runPara method.
    Runner.FailToRunInParallel
    An error reason which indicates some runner which is runned in parallel failed.
    Runner.RunInParallelExceptionOccurs
    An error reason which indicates that an exception occurs in parallelized runner.
